description: Installation of cycle hire docking station to footway.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Prior to the commencement of works full details, including detailed drawings at a scale of 1:10 shall be submitted for the following parts of the proposal;
i) Design and Layout of the Docking Points
ii) Lock and Release Mechanism of Docking Points.
No works shall take place until the Council's written approval is received.  The development shall be carried out in strict accordance with the approved details. No change shall take place from this arrangement without the prior written consent of the local planning authority.

REASON:  To make sure that the appearance of the docking station is suitable and does not harm the character of the surrounding area; in the interests of public safety; to allow ease of access and use by all users.
